interface.description: Wind Direction sensors, measuring where wind is blowing from.

field.name: Wind, Direction
field.description: Momentary Wind Direction value, as an angle against true north. Value must use an angle unit. If value is omitted, it means there's no wind.

field.name: Wind, Direction, Variation
field.description: If varying or gusty wind is measured and reported, this value represents the variation (Â±) from the mean or average wind direction reported in the field `Wind, Direction`. This field must use the same unit as `Wind, Direction`.
